page.title: 14The Brownies
page.content: I joined the Brownies when I was seven. The meetings are held at the village hall on a Tuesday.The Brownies are a group of children under eleven.Lady and Lord Baden_Powell started the Brownies .The uniform we wear is brown and we wear a yellow neckerchief. We leave at ten years old or we can stay on till we are eleven. The leader of the pack is called Brown_Owl and her helpers are Snowny_Owl and Tawny Owl. When we join we make a promise and we have to keep it till we leave.We earn badges for doing things like cooking and swimming.This is the promise we make: I promise that I will do my best. To do my duty to God. To serve the queen and to help other people and to keep the Brownie Guide law.
